mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_info WHERE is_deleted = 0;
mapper.sql: t1.id, t1.compellation, t1.sex, t1.age, t1.birthday, t1.zodiac, t1.constellation, t1.blood_type, t1.birthplace, t1.edu_degree, t1.avatar, t1.about_me
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM user_info AS t1 JOIN (SELECT id FROM user_info WHERE is_deleted = 0 LIMIT #{begin,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{end,jdbcType=INTEGER}) AS t2 ON t1.id = t2.id

update user_info
compellation = #{compellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR},
age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT},
birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zodiac = #{zodiac,jdbcType=CHAR},

gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_info set compellation = #{compellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=CHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zodiac = #{zodiac,jdbcType=CHAR}, constellation = #{constellation,jdbcType=CHAR}, blood_type = #{bloodType,jdbcType=CHAR}, birthplace = #{birthplace,jdbcType=INTEGER}, edu_degree = #{eduDegree,jdbcType=TINYINT}, avatar = #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, about_me = #{aboutMe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modified = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
